channel.title: Trading without enough space, items gone
channel.description: When you make a trade, and one of the players doesn't have enough inventory space - rather than the trade being automatically canceled the trade continues but the items that they don't have space for are lost - not dropped on the ground or returned to anyone's inventory. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Trading without enough space, items gone
item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

When you make a trade, and one of the players doesn’t have enough inventory space - rather than the trade being automatically canceled the trade continues but the items that they don’t have space for are lost - not dropped on the ground or returned to anyone’s inventory. Any help would be appreciated.
